page.title: 08 Linlithgow Gala Day
page.content: Every year in Linlithgow High Street the{ Gala Day}parade takes place children of all ages up to twelve years can take part.The many children that are picked get to ride through the town in a great procession on decorated floats.Once they arrive at the Peel and anouncments are made some of the children taking part make a few speeches, and the{Queen}for that year is then crowned. Before during and after the crowning different activities and races are held for all age groups.Altogether it is a bright and colourful day which everyone enjoys.
